about_the_game:
"Pocket Oracle" is an indie game that combines divination, exploration, and strategy with a rich world and unique decision-making system. Developed by the three-person team at Wanme Times, we’re dedicated to improving the game through community feedback, making it more immersive and enjoyable.

            POCKET ORACLE – Useful every day, foreseeing a different kind of excitement!

                                               Welcome to POCKET ORACLE!
Step into the mystical Realm of Yi, where you play as a seeker of truth, using divination and trials to uncover the secrets of fate.

Core Features of the Demo

Complete Fuxi’s Trials – Overcome six unique challenges to unlock the final prophecy.
Immersive Divination Experience – Draw hexagrams, listen to Fuxi’s insights, and receive guidance from ancient wisdom.
Choices Shape Your Destiny – Your decisions influence the outcome of the divination, making each reading unique.
Eastern Fantasy Aesthetic – Hand-drawn art and mystical imagery create a visually enchanting world of Yi.

What’s in the Demo?

This demo features the core divination system and six challenge-based trials.
Complete them all to reveal your personal prophecy!
The full game will include expanded story chapters, deeper character interactions, and more in-depth interpretations.

Demo Limitations

Limited Progress – The demo includes only six quests. More levels, characters, and features will be available in the full release!
Save Data – Progress in the demo may not carry over to the full version.

Your Feedback Matters!

This demo is a bridge between us and our players! We’d love to hear your suggestions, questions, and ideas to help us refine the final game.
Join the discussion on Steam forums and let’s create something amazing together!

The full version is coming soon—stay tuned!

"Some prop designs and background creations in this game are generated by AI intelligence, giving players a unique visual experience."

short_description: Uncover your destiny in this interactive divination game! Explore ancient Eastern wisdom and complete quests to unlock 64 hexagrams that reveal the mysteries of your destiny in love, career, health, wealth, and more. Embrace the timeless power of fortune-telling and find clarity on your life's path!

English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
